ygData.subject: Re: Welcome Linolas and I need Money!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Only way i see it is to use Dimensional Pocket...but that comes not at the start unless someone passes summoned ones to you. Also they are summoned and the
ygData.messageBody:
Only way i see it is to use Dimensional Pocket...but that comes not at the
start unless someone passes
summoned ones to you. Also they are summoned and the risks associated with
summoned items
is there...like disappear when log-off...or sometmies even when you kena
disconnected by the damn
EQ server %$&^(%^@#!$...i never put impt things in my Dimensional
Pockets...only those heavy loot.
Great thing is each pocket has 4 slots and everything in those pockets have
no weight at all. YAY~~~

p.s I usually run around with one backpack and 7 dimensional pockets.

Zanderion (mage of the 12th moon)

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 09, 1999 9:39 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Welcome Linolas and I need Money!!!


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Actually I ever thot of making human char b4, thou their stats sux and
have
> no infravision, but they can pump up their INT further via artifact, which
> will not lose out too much. Plus the fact that they lvl pretty fast.
> Maybe it's time for me to make a human caster and ask Kellendil to make
> all INT rings, earrings and brac for me and see if can power play abit,
> hehe.
>
> Erudite caster life can be damn hard in the begining, esp when they r
still
> in their town. But at later stage, their high INT make them one of the
> better casters ard. Btw, I dun think any caster on this list is putting
> stats point like I did when creating char (I put pump my STR to 75!). But
> even at 75 STR, I can get overload very fast. How u guys cope with this
> problem? (ok I admit I loot everything to sell, no choice lah, poor mah).
>
> Zil
>
> On Thursday, 08 July, 1999 9:21 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...]
> wrote:
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > Anything is better than a human mage, just don't play them. You'll
> regretted it
> > pass 10
> >

> > >

> > > > > Lemme know when you guys hang out so that I can meet up with u
> fellas.
> > > > >
> > > > > Linolas
